results.description: Wales beat one of their main Euro 2020 qualifying rivals Slovakia thanks to Daniel James' first-half strike in Cardiff.
results.shortTitle: Wales begin Euro 2020 campaign with win
results.title: Wales 1-0 Slovakia: Ryan Giggs' side begin qualifying campaign with win

results.description: Wales open their Euro 2020 qualifying campaign with a 1-0 win against Slovakia at the Cardiff City Stadium - follow radio and text reaction.

results.title: Euro 2020 qualifiers: Who are Wales' opponents?

results.shortTitle: Wales face Croatia in Euro 2020 group

results.description: Denmark field a student, a salesman and an internet star for a 3-0 defeat by Slovakia - with senior players unavailable amid a commercial dispute.
results.title: Denmark field a student and internet star during 3-0 defeat by Slovakia

results.description: Scotland head coach Gordon Strachan says he never felt stressful and was sure his side would score before their late winner against Slovakia.
results.shortTitle: Strachan's faith in Scots never wavered
results.title: Scotland 1-0 Slovakia: Gordon Strachan's faith never wavered as side leave it late

results.description: A late Martin Skrtel own goal secures a 1-0 win to keep Scotland's World Cup qualifying hopes alive.
results.title: Scotland 1-0 Slovakia

results.description: Former Scotland defender Willie Miller warns the current team to expect a Slovakia side playing for a draw at Hampden.
results.title: Slovakia will play for draw against Scotland, says Willie Miller

results.description: Gordon Strachan's team are in a better shape, but the recovery is still a soft one and it needs the ballast of a box-office win, writes Tom English.
results.title: Scotland v Slovakia: Time for a marquee win as Scots chase World Cup dream

results.description: Slovakia insist they are ready for an aggressive Scotland approach at Hampden and will seek to take the initiative in Thursdays' World Cup qualifier.
results.title: Scotland: Slovakia will seek to 'impose their play' on Scots in World Cup qualifier

thumbnail.altText: Slovakia manager Jan Kozak and midfielder Marek Hamsik

results.description: Scotland defender Andrew Robertson wants Gordon Strachan to remain as coach - even if the national side miss out on a World Cup play-off place.
results.title: Scotland: Andrew Robertson urges Gordon Strachan to stay as coach

results.description: Slovakia striker Adam Nemec says he is looking forward to the prospect of playing at a hostile Hampden and that the visitors will prevail.
results.shortTitle: Nemec not fazed by Hampden atmosphere
results.title: Scotland: Adam Nemec says Slovakia won't be fazed by hostile Hampden atmosphere

results.description: Former Celtic star Lubomir Moravcik believes a draw is the likely outcome when his countrymen face Scotland at Hampden.
results.shortTitle: Moravcik expects Slovakia to take point
results.title: Lubomir Moravcik expects Slovakia to pick up a point against Scotland

results.description: England manager Gareth Southgate believes the past week has been a great experience for his young side to learn from after two difficult World Cup qualifying wins.

results.title: England 2-1 Slovakia: Gareth Southgate says young side will learn from this week

results.description: A DNA expert is trying to find out if the Czech and Slovak hero Tomas Masaryk had an imperial father.
